A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really wanted to like Star Wars: The Last Jedi\, but it simply fell flat. It felt as though someone had seen episode 7\, saw the direction it was headed\, and very forcefully told a completely different story. The villains were at most points made to be nothing more than the butt of the joke leaving a void where a good antagonist should have been. That plus bad pacing made for not only a bad Star Wars movie\, but a bad movie period. Hopefully episode 9 turns it around.
